item.title: Top News HDFC Life Allots ₹7,490 Crore Debentures with 10-Year Maturity 1 hour ago HDFC Life Insurance Company has allotted subordinated debt instruments worth ₹7,490 crores through private placement. The company issued 74,900 unsecured, rated, listed, subordinated, redeemable, non-cumulative, non-convertible debentures with a face value of ₹1 lakh each. The debentures have a 10-year tenure, are rated AAA by ICRA and CARE, and will be redeemed at par value. Coupon payments will be made annually, subject to business day convention.
item.description: Top News HDFC Life Allots ₹7,490 Crore Debentures with 10-Year Maturity 1 hour ago HDFC Life Insurance Company has allotted subordinated debt instruments worth ₹7,490 crores through private placement. The company issued 74,900 unsecured, rated, listed, subordinated, redeemable, non-cumulative, non-convertible debentures with a face value of ₹1 lakh each. The debentures have a 10-year tenure, are rated AAA by ICRA and CARE, and will be redeemed at par value. Coupon payments will be made annually, subject to business day convention.

item.title: TCS Opens New Office in Bucharest, Romania to Strengthen European Operations 17 minutes ago Tata Consultancy Services has officially established a new office in Bucharest's Floreasca business district, as announced through regulatory filing on December 15, 2025. The facility focuses on digital engineering services and software-defined vehicle solutions, employing over 95% Romanian nationals and strengthening TCS's European delivery network that serves over 350 customers across 20 countries with more than 15,000 professionals.
item.description: TCS Opens New Office in Bucharest, Romania to Strengthen European Operations 17 minutes ago Tata Consultancy Services has officially established a new office in Bucharest's Floreasca business district, as announced through regulatory filing on December 15, 2025. item.title: Markets at Noon: Nifty and Sensex Show Slight Dip in Mid-Day Trading on December 15 2 hours ago Indian markets show a slight downward trend at midday, with Nifty 50 at 26,016.45 (-0.12%) and Sensex at 85,202.32 (-0.08%). InterGlobe Aviation faces potential regulatory action, while SEPC Limited announces a major coal mining project MOU. Market sentiment remains cautiously negative, with investors closely monitoring these developments.

item.title: Sudeep Pharma Schedules Q2FY26 Earnings Call for December 22, 2025 1 hour ago Sudeep Pharma Limited has announced an earnings conference call to discuss Q2FY26 operational and financial performance, scheduled for December 22, 2025, at 11:30 AM IST. The call will review the company's performance for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. Senior management, including Director Shanil Bhayani and CFO Ketan Vyas, will present results and address investor queries. ICICI Securities is coordinating the call using the Diamond Pass registration system.
item.description: Sudeep Pharma Schedules Q2FY26 Earnings Call for December 22, 2025 1 hour ago Sudeep Pharma Limited has announced an earnings conference call to discuss Q2FY26 operational and financial performance, scheduled for December 22, 2025, at 11:30 AM IST. The call will review the company's performance for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. Senior management, including Director Shanil Bhayani and CFO Ketan Vyas, will present results and address investor queries. ICICI Securities is coordinating the call using the Diamond Pass registration system.
